buffs.description: Increases Orc Tribe Friendliness. 40 for every 5-star and 80 for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when the unit is in Time Shop. The Tribe Friendliness increased by the Storm Warrior cannot exceed 1,000.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness (Orc)

buffs.description: Enhance Active Skill: Efficiency of Active skills(Explosion Shaking Heaven and Earth, Tower of Babel and Skyward Sword) are improved by 20/40 stages. (Effects can stack but cannot be applied when in time shop)
buffs.name: Enhance Active Skill

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it Increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily Grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack speed by 9%.
Increases the movement speed of all units by 7%, and the attack speed of all units by 9%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Tribe Friendliness for Orc can be increased up to 1,500 by Storm Warrior.

Increase Efficiency for Token Enhancement (Orc): The efficiency for Token Enhancement (Orc) is increased. Increase Tribe Friendliness by 40 for each 5-star, 100 for each 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop.

Even if the Storm Warrior is in Time Shop, efficiency of active skill increases. (However, if the Storm Warrior is in Time Shop, efficiency increased by 10 stages increased for each 5-star and 20 stages for each 6-star. The efficiency increased by Storm Warriors cannot exceed the maximum of 480 stages.)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Storm Warrior ]
